name: Shine Analytics Ltd.
description: Developer of an AI-based enterprise legal management platform designed to offer capabilities for matter management and e-billing reporting and analytics. The company's software leverages powerful language analysis technologies to analyze incoming legal invoices, uncover opportunities for reductions or alternative fee arrangements and give visibility on legal spending across the organization, enabling clients to manage and control outside counsel costs and centralize the invoice review for routing all the documents submitted to the correct approver.
one_liner: Developer of an AI-based enterprise legal management platform designed to offer capabilities for matter management and e-billing reporting and analytics. The company's software leverages powerful language analysis technologies to analyze incoming legal invoices, uncover opportunities for reductions or alternative fee arrangements and give visibility on legal spending across the organization, enabling clients to manage and control outside counsel costs and centralize the invoice review for routing all the documents submitted to the correct approver.

name: Lex Labs Holdings, Inc
description: Developer of a legal operating platform designed to digitize and automate startup legal expertise. The company's platform automates repetitive tasks including drafting agreements, educating founders on key legal topics, creating cap tables and due diligence summaries, and also builds data rooms to present a startup's entire legal structure in a single visual, enabling clients to execute agreements, manage stakeholders and make more informed decisions, all from a single platform.
one_liner: Developer of a legal operating platform designed to digitize and automate startup legal expertise. The company's platform automates repetitive tasks including drafting agreements, educating founders on key legal topics, creating cap tables and due diligence summaries, and also builds data rooms to present a startup's entire legal structure in a single visual, enabling clients to execute agreements, manage stakeholders and make more informed decisions, all from a single platform.

name: CONFIABOGADO LLC
description: Legal Fintech for blue-collar workers
one_liner: Legal Fintech for blue-collar workers

name: DillX Inc.
description: Developer of legal tech platform designed to deliver a wide range of features for companies and investors. The company's platform offers investment readiness with prudent due diligence, accelerates and simplifies the due diligence process and mitigates risk, and serves investors and companies in the Middle East and Africa.
one_liner: Developer of legal tech platform designed to deliver a wide range of features for companies and investors. The company's platform offers investment readiness with prudent due diligence, accelerates and simplifies the due diligence process and mitigates risk, and serves investors and companies in the Middle East and Africa.

name: Docket Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of a centralized platform designed to check the status of matters, monitor key information, and gain deep analytics into the legal department. The company's platform tracks team key performance indicators, and key matter data, prepares for board meetings in one click as well, and helps to make data-driven decisions about legal spending, enabling clients to manage workload and generate reports automatically.
one_liner: Developer of a centralized platform designed to check the status of matters, monitor key information, and gain deep analytics into the legal department. The company's platform tracks team key performance indicators, and key matter data, prepares for board meetings in one click as well, and helps to make data-driven decisions about legal spending, enabling clients to manage workload and generate reports automatically.

name: ElMetr, Inc.
description: Operator of an online legal platform designed to find a suitable lawyer to handle legal tasks. The company's platform allows users to search for lawyers in the streams of family law, commercial law, criminal law, civil law, military courts, workers' law, administrative judiciary, and state councils and simplifies legal practice by offering a cloud-based SaaS solution designed for lawyers, which manages cases, billing, and client interaction, enabling users to connect to qualified lawyers.
one_liner: Operator of an online legal platform designed to find a suitable lawyer to handle legal tasks. The company's platform allows users to search for lawyers in the streams of family law, commercial law, criminal law, civil law, military courts, workers' law, administrative judiciary, and state councils and simplifies legal practice by offering a cloud-based SaaS solution designed for lawyers, which manages cases, billing, and client interaction, enabling users to connect to qualified lawyers.

name: Immigram Global Limited
description: Operator of an immigration platform intended to provide legal and technology expertise to immigrants. The company's platform allows users to fill out immigration forms and choose the various options and provides step-by-step guidance on the immigration process, enabling immigrants to overcome immigration complexity.
one_liner: Operator of an immigration platform intended to provide legal and technology expertise to immigrants. The company's platform allows users to fill out immigration forms and choose the various options and provides step-by-step guidance on the immigration process, enabling immigrants to overcome immigration complexity.

name: Ironclad, Inc.
description: Developer of a contracting platform intended to transform contract processes by automating workflows and approvals. The company's platform automatically identifies key terms and entities, turns contracts into code, and allows users to search, tag, and manage their contracts, enabling legal, sales, and operations teams to streamline the way they create, store, and leverage contracts as intelligence assets.
one_liner: Developer of a contracting platform intended to transform contract processes by automating workflows and approvals. The company's platform automatically identifies key terms and entities, turns contracts into code, and allows users to search, tag, and manage their contracts, enabling legal, sales, and operations teams to streamline the way they create, store, and leverage contracts as intelligence assets.

name: JusticeText, Inc.
description: Developer of video evidence management software designed for criminal defense attorneys. The company's video evidence transcription tool offers features such as speaker recognition, timestamped notes, video clipping, accuracy heat map, exporting transcripts, and editing transcripts of body camera footage, interrogation videos, and jail calls, enabling public defenders to deliver fairer outcomes in the criminal justice system.
one_liner: Developer of video evidence management software designed for criminal defense attorneys. The company's video evidence transcription tool offers features such as speaker recognition, timestamped notes, video clipping, accuracy heat map, exporting transcripts, and editing transcripts of body camera footage, interrogation videos, and jail calls, enabling public defenders to deliver fairer outcomes in the criminal justice system.

name: The Court Buddy Company, Inc.
description: Operator of a legal marketplace intended to assist consumers in connecting with local independent attorneys. The company's platform matches attorneys who provide a-la-carte legal services at fixed rates with clients, enabling users to get access to an attorney when needed.
one_liner: Operator of a legal marketplace intended to assist consumers in connecting with local independent attorneys. The company's platform matches attorneys who provide a-la-carte legal services at fixed rates with clients, enabling users to get access to an attorney when needed.

name: LawTrades, Inc.
description: Operator of a talent recruitment platform intended to find, hire and work with professional lawyers. The company's platform allows attorneys to become independent, provides the tools to virtually eliminate admin and overhead expenditures and lets businesses hire vetted attorneys for reviewing contracts, filing patents, trademarking and immigration filings, enabling clients to find specific legal projects performed by vetted freelance attorneys at guaranteed fixed prices.
one_liner: Operator of a talent recruitment platform intended to find, hire and work with professional lawyers. The company's platform allows attorneys to become independent, provides the tools to virtually eliminate admin and overhead expenditures and lets businesses hire vetted attorneys for reviewing contracts, filing patents, trademarking and immigration filings, enabling clients to find specific legal projects performed by vetted freelance attorneys at guaranteed fixed prices.

name: Lexyom, Inc.
description: Developer of an online legal platform designed to offer experienced, international, and price-predictable legal services to clients. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence technology to offer draft legal documents and offers advisory services in the areas of contracts, tax, trademarks, and investment rounds, enabling clients to have access to a secure and confidential way to get legal advice at an affordable cost.
one_liner: Developer of an online legal platform designed to offer experienced, international, and price-predictable legal services to clients. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence technology to offer draft legal documents and offers advisory services in the areas of contracts, tax, trademarks, and investment rounds, enabling clients to have access to a secure and confidential way to get legal advice at an affordable cost.

name: Linte, Inc.
description: Developer of cloud-based legal software designed to provide document management. The company's software offers to create, manage, and automate documents and legal contracts, enabling legal professionals to gain total control over a contract life cycle.
one_liner: Developer of cloud-based legal software designed to provide document management. The company's software offers to create, manage, and automate documents and legal contracts, enabling legal professionals to gain total control over a contract life cycle.

name: Mediation Online LLC
description: Developer of an online mediation platform intended to assist in solving extrajudicial legal conflicts. The company's platform allows its users to resolve disputes between two or more parties by being connected to legal counsels and assists them in drawing up an agreement with an automated, binding mediation process, enabling Brazilian corporations and consumers to resolve legal disputes quickly and inexpensively without having to rely on third-party legal contractors, making the process fast and effective.
one_liner: Developer of an online mediation platform intended to assist in solving extrajudicial legal conflicts. The company's platform allows its users to resolve disputes between two or more parties by being connected to legal counsels and assists them in drawing up an agreement with an automated, binding mediation process, enabling Brazilian corporations and consumers to resolve legal disputes quickly and inexpensively without having to rely on third-party legal contractors, making the process fast and effective.

name: NexMind AI Pte. Ltd.
description: NexLaw’s TrialPrep platform uses AI to streamline litigation and trial preparation by automating case analysis, legal research, and evidence management for litigators.
one_liner: NexLaw’s TrialPrep platform uses AI to streamline litigation and trial preparation by automating case analysis, legal research, and evidence management for litigators.

name: Qanoniah Holdings Limited
description: Operator of a legal platform intended to offer legal search engine services. The company's platform facilitates access, understanding and dealing with Saudi legal documents with the click of a button and also provides support services to legal professionals by providing a qualitative database that includes more than sixty thousand documents and legal documents related to the Saudi system, enabling companies to find, understand and manage accurate up-to-date legal content in seconds.
one_liner: Operator of a legal platform intended to offer legal search engine services. The company's platform facilitates access, understanding and dealing with Saudi legal documents with the click of a button and also provides support services to legal professionals by providing a qualitative database that includes more than sixty thousand documents and legal documents related to the Saudi system, enabling companies to find, understand and manage accurate up-to-date legal content in seconds.

name: Raise Holdings Technologies, Inc
description: Developer of a financial platform designed to help founders and investors to manage legal and financial information and securely digitize assets. The company's platform automates clients' cap table and stores critical legal documents in one place for future due diligence creating a data-driven fundraising strategy to understand the company's value and ownership before and after their raise, and also aid sign agreements, enabling clients to make data-driven fundraising decisions, collaborate with potential investors and conveniently finalize the deal.
one_liner: Developer of a financial platform designed to help founders and investors to manage legal and financial information and securely digitize assets. The company's platform automates clients' cap table and stores critical legal documents in one place for future due diligence creating a data-driven fundraising strategy to understand the company's value and ownership before and after their raise, and also aid sign agreements, enabling clients to make data-driven fundraising decisions, collaborate with potential investors and conveniently finalize the deal.

name: Sadq Holding Limited
description: Sadq enables individuals and businesses to execute and verify documents online to make them legally binding in seconds
one_liner: Sadq enables individuals and businesses to execute and verify documents online to make them legally binding in seconds

name: Tradespace Inc.
description: Developer of intellectual property (IP) software intended to buy, sell and license IP. The company's software uses predictive analytics to connect IP generators with partners that are looking for technology, enabling companies to make good IP strategy decisions without relying on expensive consultants, brokers, and lawyers.
one_liner: Developer of intellectual property (IP) software intended to buy, sell and license IP. The company's software uses predictive analytics to connect IP generators with partners that are looking for technology, enabling companies to make good IP strategy decisions without relying on expensive consultants, brokers, and lawyers.

name: Wevorce, Inc.
description: Provider of divorce handling services intended to help couples and families get through their divorce. The company's services include assisting couples through the six broad steps of divorce planning, co-parent planning, financial agreements and divorce settlement, enabling clients to have access to lawyers, counselors and financial professionals when they need it throughout the divorce process.
one_liner: Provider of divorce handling services intended to help couples and families get through their divorce. The company's services include assisting couples through the six broad steps of divorce planning, co-parent planning, financial agreements and divorce settlement, enabling clients to have access to lawyers, counselors and financial professionals when they need it throughout the divorce process.

name: YellowPad AI Inc.
description: Developer of an AI based legal assistance tool intended to help lawyers automate their lower-level work. The company helps lawyers to easily manage their workloads, streamline their paperwork, save time on tedious tasks and reduce the risk of errors, enabling clients to maintain legal efficiency.
one_liner: Developer of an AI based legal assistance tool intended to help lawyers automate their lower-level work. The company helps lawyers to easily manage their workloads, streamline their paperwork, save time on tedious tasks and reduce the risk of errors, enabling clients to maintain legal efficiency.

name: Bequest, Inc.
description: Provider of a platform designed to create legal will online. The company's platform offers an online tool for the user to create a will or living will in minutes and help users to find and compare costs for funeral homes and cemeteries, enabling users to protect their family, property and save their time and money.
one_liner: Provider of a platform designed to create legal will online. The company's platform offers an online tool for the user to create a will or living will in minutes and help users to find and compare costs for funeral homes and cemeteries, enabling users to protect their family, property and save their time and money.

name: ClassAction Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of a legal assistance platform designed to connect users with lawyers and others who have faced a similar loss for compensating their damages. The company's Web platform lets its users share cases of damage, track viewers and others who might have faced a similar kind of damage, seek legal advice and guidance by connecting to lawyers and civil engineers, enabling citizens and victims to litigate legal hassles, compensate their loss, raise funds and lodge lawsuits in real-time.
one_liner: Developer of a legal assistance platform designed to connect users with lawyers and others who have faced a similar loss for compensating their damages. The company's Web platform lets its users share cases of damage, track viewers and others who might have faced a similar kind of damage, seek legal advice and guidance by connecting to lawyers and civil engineers, enabling citizens and victims to litigate legal hassles, compensate their loss, raise funds and lodge lawsuits in real-time.
